import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{composeWithDevTools}from'redux-devtools-extension';import rootReducer from'./rootReducers';// (process.env.NODE_ENV === "development" && window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__) || compose
var reduxDevTool=process.env.NODE_ENV==='development'?composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk.withExtraArgument())):compose(applyMiddleware(thunk.withExtraArgument()));var store=createStore(rootReducer,reduxDevTool);export default store;
